metadata.name: Paragraph
metadata.author: RenderX Team
metadata.description: Paragraph component with rich text content and formatting options - JSON replacement for built-in paragraph

styles.css: .rx-paragraph { color: var(--text-color); font-family: var(--font-family); font-size: var(--font-size); font-weight: var(--font-weight); line-height: var(--line-height); margin: var(--margin); text-align: var(--text-align); word-wrap: break-word; } .rx-paragraph--default { --text-color: #333333; --font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif; --font-size: 14px; --font-weight: 400; --line-height: 1.5; --margin: 0; --text-align: left; } .rx-paragraph--center { --text-align: center; } .rx-paragraph--right { --text-align: right; } .rx-paragraph--justify { --text-align: justify; } .rx-paragraph--small { --font-size: 12px; } .rx-paragraph--large { --font-size: 16px; } .rx-paragraph--bold { --font-weight: 600; } .rx-paragraph--light { --font-weight: 300; }

content.default: This is a paragraph of text. You can edit this content in the Control Panel.

defaultValues.content: This is a paragraph of text. You can edit this content in the Control Panel.

click.description: Triggered when the paragraph is clicked

dblclick.description: Triggered when the paragraph is double-clicked for editing
